name: Cross+Life: Whispering Revelation
description:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and intense themes of the macabre. It can be morbid at times. If you are weak of heart or can't handle that type of stuff than this game may not be for you. But if you can handle it, please go right ahead, I want you to experience this story that I have created.

It was just a normal day at Karasu High, or at least it should have been. Strange things began to happen that fateful day. An old friend out for supernatural vengeance? It possibly couldn't be, could it? Only one thing to do, find your old friend's personal belongings scattered through out this warped reality that you have been trapped in.

Solve this mystery if you can, please learn the truth, save yourself, save your friend's tormented soul! Have courage in: Cross+Life: Whispering Revelation
